Reason: The USER_STYLESHEET_URI configuration option is not considered performance-sensitive based on the provided code context and developer information. The configuration simply retrieves the user stylesheet URI from the TranscodingHints and falls back to a default behavior if not found. This operation does not directly and substantially impact system performance at the system level. The customization of the user stylesheet may affect the appearance and layout of transcoded content, but it does not have a significant performance impact.
